data.title: Careers
data.text:
Build Your Career Where

You Can Make a Difference

Whether you’re a student, recent graduate, or budding professional, joining the NIF & Photon Science Team at LLNL offers the chance to create your own unique path to success and achievement. As a member of a world-class workforce committed to helping maintain the nation’s security and scientific leadership, you can contribute to or support multi-disciplinary teams tackling grand scientific challenges well beyond the scope of most other research facilities. Working at NIF&PS offers both long-term stability and the opportunity to move among different jobs and pursue new research areas and increased responsibilities as you grow your career.

As the Laboratory’s consistently high ranking among Glassdoor’s Best Places to Work shows, our employees enjoy and appreciate LLNL’s job stability and flexibility, collegial culture, opportunities for advancement, outstanding benefit packages, commitment to work-life balance, on-site educational, recreational and outreach opportunities, and laser focus on service to the nation. The Lab’s prime location in the Tri-Valley area east of San Francisco, with its diverse cultural offerings and mild climate, is yet another reason to join our team.

The NIF & Photon Science Directorate has a rich history at LLNL, with more than 50 years of experience in building and operating the world’s highest-energy laser systems and pursuing pioneering science and engineering in lasers, optics, and photon science. NIF&PS employees also participate in cutting-edge Discovery Science research, ranging from lab-based astrophysics experiments to explorations of unique phases of materials under unprecedented pressures and temperatures. These studies offer Lab researchers the opportunity to work with internationally renowned scientists on potentially prize-winning research projects.

Do your career goals include:

Participating in multidisciplinary, collaborative, highly skilled teams pursuing breakthrough science in a stable, stimulating work environment?

Using world-class research equipment and helping develop innovative technology?

Knowing that your work serves a purpose important to the nation and the world?
